code: import React,{useState,useEffect,useMemo}from'react';import socket from'./socket';import{rollDice}from'./Dice';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function getRandomColor(username){const colors=['#e6194b','#3cb44b','#ffe119','#4363d8','#f58231','#911eb4','#46f0f0','#f032e6'];let hash=0;for(let i=0;i<username.length;i++){hash=username.charCodeAt(i)+((hash<<5)-hash);}return colors[Math.abs(hash)%colors.length];}function Chat(_ref){let{room,username,messages,setMessages,userList,setUserList,isHost,kickedUsers}=_ref;const[message,setMessage]=useState('');const userColors=useMemo(()=>{const colorMap={};userList.forEach(user=>{colorMap[user]=getRandomColor(user);});return colorMap;},[userList]);useEffect(()=>{if(!room||!username)return;socket.emit('joinRoom',{username,room});socket.on('message',data=>{setMessages(prev=>[...prev,data]);});socket.on('userList',users=>{setUserList(users);});socket.on('kicked',()=>{alert('You were kicked from the session.');window.location.href='/session-options';});return()=>{socket.off('message');socket.off('userList');socket.off('kicked');};},[room,username,setMessages,setUserList]);const sendMessage=e=>{e.preventDefault();const text=message.trim();if(!text)return;if(text==='/info'){socket.emit('sendMessage',{username,text:'Dice commands: use `/roll NdMÂ±K` to roll N dice with M sides.
